name: JustMail
tagline: JustMail is a simple mail server written in Java
body:
### In Development
The mail server is currently in development and is not yet ready for an usage in production. You can see progress on the [development branch](https://github.com/lukweb-de/just-mail/tree/development). You're welcome to contribute and help to improve everything.

### Progress
This is the progress of the server. Things written in _italics_ won't be in the first release, whereas **bold** things are finished!

* SMTP-Protocol
* Command for the console
* IMAP-Protocol
* _Junk detection_
* _Webinterface_

### Release
A date is currently not specified, but I target somewhere in October. The first release will be usable, but it won't include all planned features.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
